projects.title: EdVisorly
projects.description: EdVisorly is the first and only platform to empower community college students to explore, connect, and apply to public & private universities through one simple and transparent mobile app.

projects.title: Hepsipay Wallet
projects.description: Hepsipay Wallet is your digital wallet that allows you to make fast, secure, and easy payments on Hepsiburada.

projects.title: Vodafone Supermarket
projects.description: Vodafone Supermarket is an online market project that can be accessed from within the Vodafone Turkey mobile application.

projects.title: Vodafone Her Şey Yanımda
projects.description: Vodafone Her Şey Yanımda is an online e-commerce project that can be accessed from within the Vodafone Turkey mobile application and also from the browser.

projects.title: KitapDinler
projects.description: KitapDinler is an audiobook mobile application. You can download and listen to the content you want for free and take notes.

projects.title: Real Estate
projects.description: Real Estate is a web application that helps the property investor to calculate the values of their properties.

projects.title: TUKKS
projects.description: NATO compatible Brigade and Above Joint Command and Control System.

projects.title: Authentication and Authorization
projects.description: Web interface development of the Authentication and Authorization project.

projects.title: BilişimBI
projects.description: BilişimBI is a business intelligence product that is a product for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data from internal and external sources to provide information and analysis on the past, present, and future status of the subject under study.

projects.title: The Banks Association Of Turkey
projects.description: The Banks Association Of Turkey Data Query System is a web application where you can access statistical data and reports of The Banks Association Of Turkey.

projects.title: Central Bank Of The Republic Of Turkey
projects.description: The Electronic Data Delivery System (EVDS) presents statistical time series data produced by the CBRT and/or data produced by other institutions and compiled by the CBRT.

projects.title: BilişimBI Module Development
projects.description: I developed a module so that the codes written in R, a programming language used for statistical calculation and data visualization, will run in the BilişimBI product.

projects.title: Web Development Projects
projects.description: Worked on projects where I gained basic experience in HTML and CSS.

additionalExperiences.title: InStorey
additionalExperiences.description: InStorey is the mobile app that helps you discover boutiques, independents and concept stores that turn fun shopping experiences into memorable stories.

additionalExperiences.title: Visit Ürgüp
additionalExperiences.description: Visit Ürgüp is a city guide mobile application with all up-to-date information about Ürgüp Municipality.

additionalExperiences.title: Evka
additionalExperiences.description: A web application for a local furniture production facility to manage order, production and invoice processes.

additionalExperiences.title: Tusworld
additionalExperiences.description: Tusworld is an online learning platform. It features video and live courses of the educational institution.

additionalExperiences.title: Yürü Kazan
additionalExperiences.description: Yürü Kazan is a pedometer application. It is also a mobile application that ranks people living in the same area by step count.

summary: I am a Computer Engineering graduate from Hacettepe University with a strong academic background. I embarked on my career journey part-time in 2017 and transitioned to full-time employment in 2018. Over the past four years, I have cultivated my expertise as a Front-End Developer specializing in React and React Native. My commitment to these technologies drives my ongoing pursuit of excellence and continuous improvement in my field. I am open to relocating for opportunities and I am also committed to rapidly improving my English language skills.
